description: Stuffed pretzels with sauteed cremini mushrooms and green beans. A delicious and fun snack for game day! Vegan Recipe Gluten Free Option.
keywords: game day food, mushroom pretzels, vegan bagels
name: Stuffed Pretzels
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon raw sugar or other natural sugar/sweetener
3 Tablespoons non dairy yogurt (I used SoDelicious plain yogurt)
Kosher or sea salt for sprinkling
2 tablespoons baking soda mixed in 6 cups of water for boiling pretzels in.
1/4 teaspoon chili flakes or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat on low. Add mushrooms and cook covered for 3-4 minutes.
Add green beans, salt and chili flakes or black pepper. Mix and cook covered for 5-7 minutes until mushrooms start to brown.
